post.body: yo son... yo... yO... YO!!! "CHECK MY STYLE OUT!!!" © Blizzard Man

na fam... you dont wanna do that. LOL check your direct messages, i'll send you my pin.
na, sabzi from blue scholars won last year in seattle. me and @fwmj went. i think he's from iran or some place in the mid-east.
